description:
Free and open source DJ software for Windows, macOS, and Linux

Mixxx integrates the tools DJs need to perform creative live mixes with digital music files.
Whether you are a new DJ with just a laptop or an experienced turntablist, Mixxx can support your style and techniques of mixing.
Controller Mappings
- Korg Kaoss DJ: fix scratching with left wheel #15607 #15121
- Numark-NS6II: fix typo in NS6II.PadMode #15428
- Pioneer DJ CDJ: fix broken initiatlisation #15363 #15343 #14731
- Reloop Beatmix 2/4: fix overriding persisted fx routing #15574 #14917
- Components JogwheelBasic: Disable scratching when leaving vinylMode #15336
Skins
- LateNight PaleMoon: add icons for dark hotcue loops, optimize light SVGs #15448 #15339
- LateNight: fix color of effect toggle buttons #15467
- LateNight: work around style bug in Qt 6.9.2 causing black key button text #15404 #15351
- LateNight: revert xfader buttons to one (cycling) toggle #15395
- Tango: restore VU meter mini backpath #15544
- Improve and unify sampler sync button behaviour across all skins #15399
Library
- Playlists: polish code for moving selected Tracks #15454
- Playlists: disable all modifying actions when locked #15456
- Playlists: improve performance when activating a playlist #15465
- Track view header: avoid narrow columns after restoring header with hidden columns #15331 #10325
- Computer: fix "Refresh directory tree" action #15301
- Computer: parse artist+title from filename if both tags are empty #15302
- Computer: stop model population when switching to another feature #11445 #15677
- Library scanner: make Cancel button work again #15320 #14940
- Library scanner: fix an issue when verifying remaining tracks #15346
- Sidebar: expand items to full width to maximize click-responsive area #15330
- focus tracks view when selecting a track via deck track menu #15543
- Search: maintain cursor position when saving query #15512
- Search: add proper DateAddedFilter #15572
- Analyze view: avoid listing tracks that don't match the 'New' filter #15597 #14873
- Traktor feature: fixes to Traktor collection importer #15645
Preferences
- Library: reset library font/row height when closing without apply #15455
- Decks: fix Restore Defaults for rate slider direction and track time display #15443 #15444
- Sound Hardware: don't allow closing preferences with faulty Sound Hardware config #14576 #6077
- Library: fix display of font style #15382
- Waveforms: fix handling of invalid overview config type #15422
- Broadcast: handle and fix invalid config strings #15525
Target support
- Update macOS (Intel) runner for building Mixxx to macOS Sequoia 15 #15391
- Welcome Ubuntu 26.04 LTS Resolute Raccoon #15588
- Upload all 2.5 builds to "Patch Builds" ppa:mixxx/mixxxpatches #15436
- CMakeLists.txt: fix handling of custom CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET #15356
- debian_buildenv.sh: assert for bash #15274 #15273
- debian_buildenv.sh: use /etc/os-release instead of the obsolete /etc/lsb-release #15298
- debian_buildenv.sh: fix for Ubuntu Noble (24.10) #15292
- Fix building without an X Window screensaver #15297
- Fix building with FLAC V 1.5
- Support building with Qt 6.10: Add Qt6::GuiPrivate #15502 #15485
- Touchscreen on Windows 11: disable touch -> mouse event translation #15547 #15546
- Fix missing QuickTemplates2 in Windows Installer #15439
Misc
- Cover Art: Fix a rare issue causing an infinite loop and high CPU load when fetching a cover art from metadata failed unexpectedly #15451 #15199
- Network Clock: fix writing wrong number of silence after a long underrun #15400
- Engine: tidy debug log messages in case of sample cache misses #14793
- Engine: use the correct number of channels for underflow compensation #15394
- Effects: fix quantisation in case of engine samplerate != track samplerate #15538 #15300
- Menu bar: fix showing/hiding via Alt #15352 #15350 #15396 #15385
- Fix Menu checkbox behaviour, consistency & cleanup #15365
- Fix time warping when click-and-dragging waveform #15579 #15619 #15610
- Update Keyboard SVG #15635
